'''''aina''''' ('''''ayanā''''') means "to hallow, bless, treat as holy" in [[Quenya]]. ''airi-'' or ''aina'' means "holy, revered, numinous", also in Quenya.<ref name=Eldarin>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 149</ref>

==Etymology==
*[[Sundocarme|Root]] [[AYA]]<ref name=Eldarin/>

==Cognates==
*[[Quenya]] ''[[ainur]]''
*[[Quenya]] ''[[Airë|aire]]''
